welcome_benefits: Apple MacBook Air MMGG2HN/A worth Rs. 75,000 on realization of the joining fee

Movie & Dining: Up to 4 complimentary movie tickets each month on BookMyShow, minimum 15% discount on dining bills at partner restaurants under Culinary Treats program, discount on dining at ITC and partner hotels with Club ITC Culinaire membership
Rewards Rate: 6 Reward Points per Rs. 100 on internationally and 3 Reward Points on domestic spends.
Reward Redemption: The ICICI Reward Points can be redeemed against cashback or gifts at a rate of 1 Reward Point = Rs. 0.25.
Travel: Taj Epicure Plus and InnerCircle Gold membership, unlimited complimentary domestic and international airport lounge access
Domestic Lounge Access: Unlimited complimentary domestic airport lounge access
International Lounge Access: Unlimited complimentary international airport lounge access
Golf: Unlimited complimentary rounds of golf at domestic and international Golf courses
Insurance Benefits: Credit shield cover worth Rs. 50,000 and many travel-related insurance benefits including a personal air accident cover worth Rs. 3 crore.

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: The renewal fee is waived off an annual expenditure of Rs. 25 lakh or more in the previous year.
fees_charges.Rewards Redemption Fee: Rs. 99 (plus applicable taxes) for every redemption request
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge is waived off on all fuel transactions up to Rs. 4,000
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the amount withdrawn subject to a minimum charge of Rs. 300

product_details: Apple MacBook Air MMGG2HN/A as a welcome gift on the realization of the joining fee.
6 Reward Points per Rs. 100 on international purchases.
3 Reward points per Rs. 100 on domestic purchases.
Up to 4 complimentary movie tickets every month on BookMyShow.
A minimum discount of 15% on dining bills at partner restaurants with the Culinary Treats program.
Discounts on dining bills at ITC hotels and partner hotels with Club ITC Culinaire membership.
Unlimited complimentary domestic & international lounge access for both primary and guest cardholder(s).
Unlimited complimentary golf rounds at premium golf courses across India.
Complimentary Taj Epicure Plus and InnerCircle Gold membership.
Travel-related insurance benefits including a personal air accident cover worth Rs. 3 crore and Credit shield cover worth Rs. 50,000.
24Ã—7 concierge service for assistance regarding hotel/flight bookings, medical services and emergency auto assistance.
